titles.title: A bill to authorize Escambia County Florida, to convey certain lands in Florida to a political subdivision of the State of Florida, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

bill.summary: 4/21/1994--Introduced. Authorizes Escambia County, Florida, to convey certain lands to a political subdivision of the State of Florida. (Currently, such lands may be conveyed by the County only by lease or to the Federal Government, the State of Florida, or a State agency.)
